Plot: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.
Title: My Best Friend's Girl
Actors: Dane Cook, Kate Hudson, Alec Baldwin, Jason Biggs
tomatoConsensus: My Best Friend's Girl spends too much time being vulgar and offensive, leaving little room for laughs.
